summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle in the sum of Two Hundred Thirty-nine and 14/100 Dollars ($239.14), for the purpose of completing the improvement of Seventh Avenue Northwest et al., by grading the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 20425, creating Local Improvement District No. 2020.
